name: PAT_RELATIONSHIP_ADDR
description: This table contains information about the patient contacts' addresses. The records included in this table are Patient Relationships (RLA) records.

columns.name: PAT_RELATIONSHIP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient contact record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
